page.title: 11NOTABLE EVENTS
page.content: Although R.A.F Molesworth is outside our survey area,it has a great affect on our villages,because of the controversy about siting Cruise Missiles of the American Airforce in this country.There is a lot of protest from the C.N.D. movement and other groups and peace camps were set up.This has meant that there have been many more people in the area,particularly Easter 1985 when there was a demonstration of 5,000 people. There are a lot more police about as well . many of the local people do not like the campers being here,but many people do.They have mostly been moved on by the police butmore demonstrations are planed for the future.The Ministry of Defence has erected a huge perimeter fence at the base.The missiles are due to arrive in 1988.
